p: In another embodiment, where two groups are "optionally joined together to form a ring," the two groups are covalently bonded together with the atom or atoms to which the two groups are joined to form a substituted or unsubstituted aryl, a substituted or unsubstituted heteroaryl, a substituted or unsubstituted cycloalkyl, or a substituted or unsubstituted heterocycloalkyl ring.
